name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, launch Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a haiku”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
To get a haiku, you can say 'Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a haiku.'

There are ten haikus in total, and the skill will randomly choose one of them.

Here is a dialog example.

You: 
Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a haiku.

Alexa: 
I have a haiku for you: 
Berlin is a place.
Full of historical stuff.
Come and visit us.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
